page.title: 10Life Styles Disabled Young
page.content: Davinder goes about in an electrically powered wheel chair which is most useful indoors. Pupils in wheelchairs agree that more ramps on pavements in town and more space in restaurants and snack bars would make the town centre more enjoyable. Toilet facilities in public places need to be improved. When travelling greater distances Davinder uses a specially adapted minibus or taxi. Nassiem particularly enjoys horse riding, swimming and knitting. She has discovered many ways of helping herself to do these things better. Most pupils enjoy youth club where able bodied adn disabled young people enjoy sport and other activities together. Computer games are very popular. Duane's ambitions are to have a job, car and wife, to enjoy his life and to live to a ripe old age.
